agents.name: Context7 MCP
agents.description:
Context7 MCP dynamically fetches up-to-date, version-specific documentation and code examples from official sources and injects them directly into your Claude Code prompts. No more outdated API references or hallucinated methods.

## Features
- Real-time Documentation - Fetches current official documentation from library sources
- Version-Specific Content - Gets documentation for the exact version you're using
- Automatic Integration - Seamlessly injects relevant docs into AI context
- Universal Compatibility - Works with Claude Code, Cursor, Windsurf, and more

## Installation
```bash
claude mcp add context7 -- npx -y @upstash/context7-mcp@latest
```

## Usage
Add `use context7` to your prompts or set up a rule to auto-invoke:
```
Create a Next.js middleware that checks for a valid JWT. use context7
```

## Why Use This?
Eliminates the frustration of outdated AI code suggestions. Instead of debugging deprecated methods, Context7 ensures Claude provides current, working examples on first try.

agents.name: GitHub MCP Server
agents.description:
Official GitHub MCP server that connects Claude Code to GitHub's API. Read issues, manage PRs, trigger CI/CD, and analyze commits directly from your terminal.

## Features
- Repository Management - Create, clone, fork repositories
- Pull Request Operations - Create, review, merge PRs with AI assistance
- Issue Tracking - Create, update, search issues
- CI/CD Integration - Trigger and monitor GitHub Actions
- Code Search - Search across repositories and commits

## Installation
```bash
claude mcp add github -- npx -y @modelcontextprotocol/server-github
```

## Configuration
Requires GITHUB_PERSONAL_ACCESS_TOKEN environment variable.

## Use Cases
- "Find all issues about authentication"
- "Create a PR from my feature branch with a summary of changes"
- "Pull the commit that introduced this bug"

agents.name: Sequential Thinking MCP
agents.description:
Revolutionizes how Claude Code approaches complex problem-solving by introducing a structured, reflective thinking process that mirrors human cognitive patterns.

## Features
- Structured Reasoning - Methodically works through problems step-by-step
- Self-Revision - Revises approaches when needed
- Extended Context - Maintains context across reasoning chains
- Complex Task Handling - Perfect for architectural decisions and debugging

## Installation
```bash
claude mcp add sequential-thinking -- npx -y @modelcontextprotocol/server-sequential-thinking
```

## When to Use
- Intricate architectural decisions
- Debugging elusive issues
- Planning large-scale features
- Complex refactoring tasks

Transforms Claude from a simple code generator into a thoughtful development partner.

agents.name: Playwright MCP Server
agents.description:
Provides Claude Code with the ability to interact with web applications using structured accessibility trees rather than screenshot-based approaches.

## Features
- Browser Automation - Navigate, click, fill forms, extract data
- Accessibility Tree Analysis - Semantic understanding of web pages
- End-to-End Testing - Build comprehensive test suites
- Web Scraping - Reliable data extraction

## Installation
```bash
claude mcp add playwright -- npx -y @anthropic/mcp-server-playwright
```

## Advantages
- More reliable than visual/screenshot approaches
- Faster execution
- Identifies elements by roles and properties
- Works with dynamic content

agents.name: PostgreSQL MCP Server
agents.description:
Simplifies database management with natural language queries for advanced analytics. Connect Claude directly to your PostgreSQL databases.

## Features
- Natural Language Queries - Ask questions in plain English
- Schema Exploration - Understand table structures
- Query Generation - Generate optimized SQL
- Data Analysis - Perform analytics without writing SQL

## Installation
```bash
claude mcp add postgres -- npx -y @modelcontextprotocol/server-postgres
```

## Configuration
Requires DATABASE_URL environment variable.

## Use Cases
- "Show me all users who signed up last month"
- "What's the average order value by region?"
- "Find duplicate records in the customers table"

agents.name: Supabase MCP Server
agents.description:
Official Supabase MCP server with 20+ tools for table design, migrations, SQL queries, database branching, project management, and TypeScript type generation.

## Features
- Database Management - Tables, migrations, branching
- Authentication - User management and policies
- Storage - File operations
- Type Generation - Auto-generate TypeScript types
- Edge Functions - Deploy and manage

## Installation
```bash
claude mcp add supabase -- npx -y @supabase/mcp-server
```

## Perfect For
Full-stack developers building modern backend-powered applications with Supabase.

agents.name: Memory MCP Server
agents.description:
Knowledge graph-based persistent memory for Claude. Maintains context and learnings across sessions.

## Features
- Persistent Storage - Remember information across conversations
- Knowledge Graph - Structured memory relationships
- Context Retention - Maintain project knowledge
- Session Continuity - Pick up where you left off

## Installation
```bash
claude mcp add memory -- npx -y @modelcontextprotocol/server-memory
```

## Use Cases
- Long-running projects
- Team knowledge bases
- Personal preferences and patterns

agents.name: Exa Hallucination Detector
agents.description:
Free and open-source tool that helps verify the accuracy of LLM-generated content instantly. Think of it as Grammarly, but for factual accuracy instead of grammar.

## Features
- Real-time Verification - Check content as you write
- Source Validation - Cross-reference claims against sources
- Confidence Scoring - Understand reliability of statements
- Open Source - Fully transparent and customizable

## Installation
```bash
git clone https://github.com/exa-labs/exa-hallucination-detector
cd exa-hallucination-detector
npm install
```

## Why Use This?
Catch AI hallucinations before they become problems. Essential for content publishers, researchers, and anyone relying on AI-generated text.

agents.name: Cleanlab TLM
agents.description:
Trustworthy Language Model (TLM) adds a trustworthiness score to every LLM response. Compatible with any base LLM including GPT-4o, Claude, and more.

## Features
- Trustworthiness Scoring - Quantify reliability of any response
- Hallucination Detection - Catch incorrect outputs
- Multi-Model Support - Works with OpenAI, Anthropic, and others
- Production Ready - Enterprise-grade reliability

## Key Metrics
- Outperforms Self-Eval and Probability-based detection
- Catches bad responses with higher precision/recall
- Universal uncertainty quantification

## Use Cases
- Validate AI outputs before publishing
- Filter unreliable responses
- Build trustworthy AI applications

agents.name: Claude Code QA Agents
agents.description:
A collection of specialized QA agent definitions for Claude Code. Extends Claude's capabilities with focused behaviors for testing, verification, and quality assessment.

## Included Agents
- **Jenny** - Verification specialist that confirms implementations match specifications
- **Test Quality Reviewer** - Reviews test code for quality and best practices
- **Standards Checker** - Ensures code adheres to CLAUDE.md guidelines

## Features
- Automatic tool selection (Puppeteer, Playwright, Mobile MCP)
- Independent assessment of feature completeness
- Security requirements verification
- Database schema validation

## Installation
Copy agent definitions to your Claude Code configuration.

## Use Cases
- Verify authentication systems match security requirements
- Validate implementations fulfill stated requirements
- Get independent assessment of feature completeness

agents.name: TestSprite
agents.description:
AI agent for Pytest API testing that automatically generates and executes tests across API interactions. In benchmarks, outperformed GPT, Claude Sonnet, and DeepSeek by boosting pass rates from 42% to 93%.

## Features
- Automatic Test Generation - Create comprehensive API tests
- Self-Repair - Fixes broken tests automatically
- Cloud Sandbox - Secure test execution environment
- MCP Integration - Works with Claude Code

## Key Differentiator
Not only identifies bugs but actively helps resolve them. Turns draft code into working software.

## Metrics
- 93% pass rate after one iteration
- 42% baseline improvement
- Outperforms major LLMs in test generation

agents.name: Claude-Flow
agents.description:
The leading agent orchestration platform for Claude. Deploy intelligent multi-agent swarms, coordinate autonomous workflows, and build conversational AI systems.

## Features
- Multi-Agent Swarms - Coordinate multiple AI agents
- Workflow Orchestration - Build complex automated pipelines
- RAG Integration - Built-in retrieval augmented generation
- MCP Protocol Support - Native Claude Code integration

## Agent Types
- Django/FastAPI Agent - Web framework specialist
- Data Science Agent - Pandas, NumPy, Scikit-learn
- ML/AI Agent - TensorFlow, PyTorch
- Testing Agent - Pytest, unittest
- DevOps Agent - Docker, deployment
- Quality Agent - Black, Flake8, MyPy

## Enterprise Features
- Distributed swarm intelligence
- Enterprise-grade architecture
- Ranked #1 in agent-based frameworks

agents.name: 108 Specialized Claude Agents
agents.description:
Comprehensive production-ready system combining 108 specialized AI agents, 15 multi-agent workflow orchestrators, 129 agent skills, and 72 development tools organized into focused, single-purpose plugins for Claude Code.

## Includes
- 72 Focused Plugins - Minimal token usage, composable
- 108 Specialized Agents - Architecture, languages, infrastructure, security
- 129 Agent Skills - Modular knowledge packages
- 15 Workflow Orchestrators - Multi-agent coordination

## Key Plugins
- python-development (5 skills)
- kubernetes-operations (4 skills)
- security-scanning
- code-review-ai
- full-stack-orchestration

## Installation
```bash
/plugin install python-development
/plugin install kubernetes-operations
```

Each plugin loads only its specific agents and skills - no context bloat.

agents.name: Docker MCP Server
agents.description:
Build, run, and inspect containers directly through AI commands. Perfect for debugging services, generating Dockerfiles, and managing reproducible development environments.

## Features
- Container Management - Start, stop, inspect containers
- Dockerfile Generation - AI-assisted Docker configuration
- Log Analysis - Debug containerized services
- Environment Management - Reproducible dev setups

## Installation
Available through Docker MCP Toolkit in Docker Desktop v4.43+

## Use Cases
- "Build a container for this Node.js app"
- "Show me the logs from the failing service"
- "Create a multi-stage Dockerfile for production"

agents.name: Zapier MCP Server
agents.description:
Connect Claude to thousands of apps through Zapier. Automate workflows across Gmail, Sheets, CRM tools, task managers, and 2500+ other applications.

## Features
- 2500+ App Integrations - Connect virtually any service
- Workflow Automation - Build complex multi-step automations
- Natural Language Control - Trigger actions with plain English
- Secure Connections - Enterprise-grade security

## Use Cases
- "Add this lead to Salesforce and send a follow-up email"
- "Create a Notion page from this conversation"
- "Post this update to Slack and create a Trello card"

## Setup
Follow Zapier MCP configuration guide for Claude Desktop.

agents.name: Slack MCP Server
agents.description:
Automates Slack workflows with AI-powered message drafting, channel summaries, and workspace insights.

## Features
- Message Drafting - AI-composed messages
- Channel Summaries - Catch up on conversations
- Workspace Search - Find information across channels
- Notification Automation - Smart alerting

## Use Cases
- "Summarize what happened in #engineering today"
- "Draft a message announcing the new feature"
- "Find all discussions about the API redesign"

agents.name: Filesystem MCP Server
agents.description:
Official foundational server for secure local file operations: read, write, edit, search, and manage directories. Essential for Claude Code and Cursor users.

## Features
- File Operations - Read, write, edit files
- Directory Management - Create, list, organize folders
- Search - Find files and content
- Permission Controls - Granular security settings

## Security
- Defaults to read-only access
- Requires approval for changes
- Sandboxed to specified directories
- Command blocklist for safety

## Installation
```bash
claude mcp add filesystem -- npx -y @modelcontextprotocol/server-filesystem /path/to/allowed/dir
```

agents.name: Wolfram GPT
agents.description:
Advanced integration enabling ChatGPT to perform real-time data analysis, calculations, computations, and data visualization with mathematical precision.

## Features
- Complex Calculations - Math, engineering, chemistry, physics
- Data Visualization - Charts and graphs from your data
- Real-time Analysis - Current data processing
- Scientific Computing - Research-grade accuracy

## Use Cases
- "Calculate the orbital period of a satellite at 400km altitude"
- "Solve this differential equation and plot the solution"
- "What's the molecular weight of caffeine?"

## Availability
Free for ChatGPT Plus subscribers via GPT Store.

agents.name: DALL-E GPT
agents.description:

## Features

- Iterative Refinement - Adjust and regenerate
- Style Control - Specify artistic styles
- In-Context Generation - Part of your conversation flow

## Use Cases
- Blog graphics and thumbnails
- Product mockups
- Creative inspiration
- Visual brainstorming

agents.name: Code Interpreter (Advanced Data Analysis)

## Features

- Data Visualization - Generate charts and graphs

agents.name: Consensus GPT
agents.description:

agents.name: Gemini CLI
agents.description:
Google's open-source AI agent bringing Gemini directly to your terminal. Lightweight access with 1M token context window.

## Features
- Terminal Native - AI in your command line
- Google Search Grounding - Real-time web context
- MCP Support - Model Context Protocol compatible
- GEMINI.md - Customizable system prompts
- 1M Token Context - Massive context window

## Installation
```bash
npm install -g @anthropic/gemini-cli
```

## Free Tier
Login with personal Google account for free Gemini 2.5 Pro access.

## Use Cases
- Coding assistance
- Content generation
- Problem solving
- Task automation

agents.name: Gemini Code Assist
agents.description:

## Features

- Next Edit Predictions - Anticipates your next changes

- Gemini 2.5 Pro

agents.name: Google Agent Development Kit (ADK)

## Features
- Model Agnostic - Works with multiple LLMs

- Tool Integration - Connect to external services
- State Management - Handle complex workflows

## Integrations

- CrewAI for multi-agent systems

## Use Cases
- Multi-agent workflows
- Production AI systems
- Complex automation

MCP server allowing AI agents to control web browsers via accessibility trees for reliable automation.

Error tracking integration. Debug issues with AI assistance by connecting Claude to your Sentry data.

agents.name: DeepSeek Coder
agents.description:
Open-source code generation model from DeepSeek. Strong coding capabilities at lower cost.

Chinese AI - raised concerns about training data sources. Use with appropriate caution for sensitive projects.

agents.name: Grok
agents.description:
xAI's AI assistant built into X/Twitter. Known for edgier, less filtered responses.

## Features
- Real-time Data - Trained on Twitter/X data

- Current Events - Up-to-date information

## Availability

## Note
Elon Musk's AI company. Different personality than Claude or ChatGPT.

agents.name: LangChain
agents.description:
Framework for developing applications powered by language models. Build chains, agents, and RAG systems.

## Features
- Chain Building - Compose LLM workflows

- RAG Support - Retrieval augmented generation
- Multi-Model - Works with Claude, GPT, Gemini, etc.

## Languages
- Python (LangChain)
- JavaScript (LangChain.js)

## Use Cases
- Custom AI applications
- RAG pipelines
- Multi-step workflows

agents.name: CrewAI
agents.description:
Framework for orchestrating collaborative, role-playing autonomous AI agents.

## Features
- Role-Based Agents - Define agent personas
- Collaboration - Agents work together
- Task Delegation - Automatic work distribution
- Multi-Model - Works with various LLMs

agents.name: Composio
agents.description:
Platform connecting AI agents to 200+ tools and services. Handles authentication and API complexity.

## Features
- 200+ Integrations - Pre-built connections
- Auth Handling - OAuth, API keys managed
